name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Analytics Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in data transformation and visualization, leveraging core competencies in **SQL**, **dbt**, **dimensional modelling**, and **Data Vault** methodologies. Proficient in managing **ELT processes** and utilizing tools like **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI** for data analytics. Experienced in working with **Snowflake** for optimized data storage and management. Adept at collaborating in **agile environments**, showcasing strong **communication skills** in both **French** and **English**. As a self-starter, I have a proven record of successfully delivering impactful data-driven solutions at leading organizations, enhancing operational effectiveness and decision-making.

experience.responsibilities:
Employed **SQL** and **dbt** to design and optimize data models enhancing data retrieval efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented **dimensional modelling** techniques and designed **Data Vault** architecture to accurately capture and organize large datasets for analytical purposes.
Streamlined the **ELT process** using tools like **Snowflake**, ensuring data integrity and availability within a **4-hour** turnaround.
Utilized version control with **Git** to maintain project integrity and enhance collaboration in an **agile environment**.
Developed intuitive dashboards and reports using **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**, improving stakeholder insights by **25%**.
Communicated effectively in both **French** and **English** to collaborate with team members and stakeholders, ensuring alignment toward project goals.
Proactively took initiative as a **self-starter**, contributing innovative ideas to enhance team workflows and project outcomes.

Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** for data transformation and modeling in analytics projects, ensuring high-quality data is consistently delivered for reports across **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, and **Power BI**.
Designed and implemented dimensional models and **Data Vault** architectures to enhance data accessibility and business understanding in analytics initiatives, improving reporting speed by **30%**.
Developed and optimized the **ELT process**, resulting in streamlined data ingestion and increased performance by processing over **5 million records daily**.
Leveraged **Git** for version control and collaborative project management within an **agile environment**, enhancing team productivity and code quality.
Worked with **Snowflake** for the management of large-scale datasets, ensuring efficient analytics and reporting solutions across the organization.
Communicated effectively in both **French** and **English** to support cross-departmental collaboration and deliver presentations to stakeholders, enhancing project visibility.
Actively participated as a self-starter in team meetings and sprint planning sessions, contributing innovative solutions and fostering a collaborative team culture.

- Utilized **SQL** to perform data manipulations and queries for generating actionable insights and reports, improving data-driven decision-making.
- Developed transformation models using **dbt** and **dimensional modelling** techniques to structure data efficiently for analytics, enhancing data accessibility and usability.
- Designed and implemented the **Data Vault** strategy for data warehousing, ensuring scalable and maintainable ETL processes that support business growth.
- Streamlined the **ELT process** to facilitate rapid data ingestion and transformation, reducing processing time by **30%**.
- Integrated and visualized data through tools such as **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI**, improving stakeholder engagement and data comprehension.
- Managed version control using **Git**, ensuring a robust collaborative workflow and code integrity through proper documentation and branching strategies.
- Collaborated in an **agile environment**, participating in iterative development cycles to enhance project deliverables in a timely manner, achieving **95%** on-time delivery.
- Demonstrated effective communication skills in both **French** and **English**, facilitating cross-team collaboration and understanding throughout projects.
- Functioned as a **self-starter**, identifying opportunities for process improvement and independently driving initiatives to enhance operational efficiency.
